statements.select: SELECT MENU_IDX , GROUP_IDX , MENU_KOR_NM , MENU_ENG_NM , MENU_CHN_NM , MENU_ETC1_NM , MENU_ETC2_NM , MENU_URL , MENU_DES , MENU_ICON , USE_FL FROM SYS_MENU ORDER BY MENU_ORD

select g.vend_nm, count(dist_file_idx) as dist_file_cnt, sum(hiscnt) as down_cnt from ( select u.us_group, B.dist_file_idx, case when L.action_target_idx is null then 0 else 1 end hiscnt from dist_receiver A left join dist_master dist on A.dist_idx = dist.dist_idx left join dist_recv_file B on A.recv_idx = B.recv_idx and b.use_fl='Y' left join log_action_history L on L.action_module = 10 and L.action_type in (90, 100) and L.action_target_idx = B.dist_file_idx left join sys_users u on A.recv_us = u.us_idx and u.us_role = 10 where u.us_group is not null and dist.dist_dt >= #search_dt# group by u.us_group, B.dist_file_idx, L.action_target_idx)t left join sys_vender g on t.us_group = g.vend_idx group by g.vend_nm order by g.vend_nm

select mmdd as dist_date, count(dist_idx) as dist_cnt from ( WITH date_series AS (select DATE(GENERATE_SERIES(#search_dt#, now(),'1 day')) AS date) SELECT to_char(date, 'MM-DD') as mmdd FROM date_series) a left join ( select to_char(dist_dt, 'MM-DD') as dist_date, dist_idx from dist_master where dist_dt >= #search_dt# )t on a.mmdd = t.dist_date group by mmdd order by mmdd
